title: 40 ms 300+ FPS, still lagging and freeze often. Any conclusion?
body: Since the last patch(when the urf mode), my leagues just freezes all day long with low ping and steady 60fps. Wi-fi is working well have no idea why am I lagging. Anyone have the problem?

replies.body:
This might have something to do with a possible graphics driver being out of date, but I'm curious as to if your FPS is going up due to the new Arcade assets on Summoners Rift. Let's go ahead and hit both points by using our [**FPS guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting) to check for anything that may need some updates, but also try disabling the arcade assets through the in-game options.

https://i.gyazo.com/b79c9b420bb4479b68caeefdef605d83.png
